We look forward to welcoming you again soon!

reviews.text:
Very slow!!
All 4 of us.. ordered different items and was all sick
reviews.owner_answer:
Lizette, as you do not have the courtesy to reply to my message, we simply will not give credence to your complaint and consequently have reported it to google reviews to be removed. 

Good day Lizette 
I alarmed to read your review. The comment that you and all of your guests were sick is a very serious accusation. We maintain strict hygiene protocols; we move vast quantities of stock and employ the services of Ecolab (a hygiene company recognised worldwide). Please contact me urgently as I need more information to investigate the matter. 
Thank you 
Duncan 
082 456 3921
coffeejunctioncafe@telkomsa.net

reviews.author: Wendy Vorster

reviews.text:
Was looking forward to trying this place but was so bitterly disappointed. The food took so long, about 15 min for 2 cappuccinos and 45min for an eggs Benedict. The waitress seated us and proceeded to disappear without even taking our order. we had to flag down other waiters to take our orders. They brought incomplete cutlery. We constantly had to ask for basic things, cutlery, serviettes, condiments, etc.
The (presumably) manager (white male) was so rude 🫨. We were speaking to the waitress about our order, he just walked up to our table and began scolding her in front of us, which was very degrading for her, but he didn’t even bother to greet or acknowledge us or the fact that the waitress was in the middle of a conversation already. It was my first and last time.

sub_ratings.Seating type: Indoor dining area, Outdoor patio / terrace

reviews.owner_answer:
18 Sept 2025
Despite our efforts to reach out to you Thato, you have not afforded us the courtesy of a reply. Consequently, I am unable to implement corrective action or address your complaint and therefor your complaint has no credence. Also, just something for your consideration, have the courage of your convictions.

Dear Thato,
Thank you sincerely for your feedback. I’m truly sorry for the disappointing service you experienced—it’s not the standard we strive for.
While this is by way of explanation rather than excuse, I want to assure you that customer service is a top priority for us. Despite ongoing training, there are unfortunately instances where some of our staff overlook basic service steps, such as ensuring cutlery is placed before meals are served. This lapse directly impacts our guests’ experience, and I regret that it affected yours.
If I came across as “rude”, please know it stemmed from frustration with the situation and the failure on our part to deliver the quality you deserve. I will personally investigate the matter, review the relevant camera footage, and take corrective steps to ensure this doesn’t happen again.
Your input means a great deal to us —it helps us and reinforces our commitment to accountability. I’d appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly and hear more about your experience. Please contact me on 082 456 3921 at your convenience.
Kind regards
Duncan
reviews.author: Thato R.

reviews.owner_answer: Hi David, Many thanks for your rating and support. We are most grateful for you taking time out to let us know. See you soon. CJC Team

reviews.text: Nice coffee shop. Service is just very slow.
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Talita. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us—we truly appreciate it! Our goal is to provide swift service while maintaining the highest quality in our dishes, which are always freshly prepared. During busy periods, achieving quick delivery can be trying, but rest assured that we are always doing our best to serve you efficiently.
If we are not too busy and you find yourself waiting longer than expected, please don't hesitate to call on one of us for assistance. As owners, we are always available, and if we're not present, our wonderful manageresses, Barbara and Claudia, are on duty and ready to help.
We sincerely appreciate your message and your support. We look forward to welcoming you again soon! Duncan, Rosanne and Lara
reviews.author: Talita Flinspach

reviews.text: I had an amazing experience at Coffee Junction Cafe, and I have to give a special shoutout to Barbara! Her exceptional service and genuine customer care made my visit truly memorable. She was so friendly, attentive, and went out of her way to make sure I had everything I needed. The café itself was also spotless and inviting, creating the perfect atmosphere for a relaxing break. Highly recommend this place, and Barbara is definitely a standout!
reviews.owner_answer:
Hi Madelaine
Thank you for your lovely rating, review, and message. We’ve shared your kind words with Barbara and the rest of the team—they truly appreciate it. Your feedback means the world to us, and we’re grateful you took the time to let us know.
We look forward to welcoming you back soon!
Kind regards, The CJC Team
reviews.author: Madelein Steyn

reviews.text:
Coffee Junction Café in Montana Park, Pretoria, offers a delightful dining experience with its inviting atmosphere and diverse menu. Located at Zambezi Junction South, Shop 38, 1123 Tibouchina Street, the café is known for its warm ambiance and attentive service.  ￼

The menu features a variety of breakfast and lunch options, with dishes like eggs benedict and Greek easy scramble receiving high praise from patrons.  The café opens early, making it a convenient spot for both business meetings and leisurely meals.  ￼

The staff is known for their friendly and efficient service, contributing to the overall positive experience. The café’s management is well-organized and professional, ensuring that each visit is enjoyable.  ￼

Coffee Junction Café operates from 6:30 am to 6:00 pm on weekdays, with slightly adjusted hours on weekends.  This schedule accommodates both early risers and those looking for a cozy spot later in the day. ￼

Overall, Coffee Junction Café provides a pleasant dining environment with quality food and excellent service, making it a recommended destination for those in the Montana Park area.

sub_ratings.Recommended dishes: Eggs Benedict, Sesame Chicken Feta Avocado Tramezzini

reviews.owner_answer:
Goodness, what a marvelous and comprehensive review! We are thrilled to have impressed you and that you enjoyed your visit to our coffee shop. Your feedback is incredibly encouraging and motivating for our entire team. While we value all feedback, we are absolutely delighted to receive such a splendid review like yours. Thank you for your kindness and support.
The CJC Team
reviews.author: hf delport

reviews.text:
Cannot wait to return to this spot. My every whim has been catered to!
I saw a few 1stars but those people are clearly entitled to home chef service, because here I have zero to none issues. 15/10 would recommend!!!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you for awesome 5 star review!!! We value the feedback and your positive comment. We look forward to seeing you soon.
reviews.author: CORSTRUCTION

reviews.text: Coffee Junction is definitely worth a visit. The burgers are incredible and kids loved the chicken strips! The venue is child friendly. Great spot!

reviews.text: The pasta I ordered was delicious, I also ordered a salad everything was fresh. The service was fantastic. The manager I think he’s name is Duncan was friendly and chatty. Great vibe. Will go again. Food 10, service 10
reviews.owner_answer: Sandra, thank you for taking the time out of your very busy schedule to rate and review our coffee shop. We are delighted to have made a positive impression! You’ll be happy to know that we use authentic Italian ingredients to prepare our pasta sauces, and we source lettuce and other salad ingredients from Woolies to ensure freshness at all times. We look forward to seeing you again soon! Grazie mille. Ciao
reviews.author: Sandra Valente

reviews.text: Best chicken strips in town.
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you Zoe for your kind comments and feedback. I must say that the chicken strips are certainly a firm favorite of many of clients. See you in store soon. Duncan
reviews.author: Zoe Geekie

reviews.text:
Good portions are generous and tasty. 🍲

Service is sometimes lacking (slow, inattentive, unfriendly or forgetting items) but I do keep returning for the value for money and delicious food. Owners are friendly.  😊

💓 The barista makes really cute latte art!

☹️ It’s often very busy and noisy and cigarette smoke blows in from outside.
reviews.owner_answer: Hi Lindie. Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your thoughtful and constructive feedback. We appreciate your input and are delighted to hear that you enjoy our food and coffee. Regarding the service, we acknowledge that we've had a few service issues. Please be assured that we're working to address them. Following a recent staff turnover, we're investing in extensive training for our new team members to ensure they provide the excellent service you deserve. We'd be thrilled to have you visit us again and continue to share your experiences with us. Your input is invaluable in helping us improve, and we welcome your ongoing support. Thank you again for your feedback. Duncan, Rosanne, and Lara
reviews.author: Lindie Botes

reviews.text: The service of this place is really taking a turn for the worst. The waiters just have no sense of urgency and seem completely lost as to what to do. They bring food without cutlery, they forget orders, fail to check in during the meal. This has been the case for months now. When you take it up with the manager, he is quick to apologise and offer vouchers for free meals, but we don’t go there for free meals… its the general operation of the establishment that needs attention. If you want to go for a quick meal, rather find another place, as this establishment doesn’t mind to have you wait for coffee and a piece of toast.
reviews.owner_answer:
Dear Jana. 
We, as owners, share your frustration with the recent service issues. We'd like to provide some context, not as an excuse, but to help understand the situation. Unfortunately, we've experienced a significant staff turnover due to the inability of our long-standing Zimbabwean employees to renew their visas.
These team members were highly capable and had been with us for many years. We've since hired new South African staff and are investing in extensive training to restore our service standards.
Although we understand that you didn't visit our shop for a free meal, we offered you vouchers as a gesture of goodwill and a sincere apology for your poor service experience. We hope this will demonstrate our commitment to making things right.
We value your feedback and would be delighted to have you visit us again, giving us the opportunity to show you our improved service. Your continued feedback is welcome, and we appreciate the time you've taken to share your concerns.
Thank you for your understanding. Duncan
reviews.author: Jana Britz

reviews.text: Compliments to the chef and the team for fresh decadent food varieties, excellent front house service and perfect atmosphere . Just lovit

reviews.owner_answer: Hi Annemae, thank you for taking the time out to rate and review Coffee Junction Café. We are located right opposite a wheel chair friendly parking bay with easy access to the inside of the restaurant. There is also a ramp up onto deck area. There is a wheel chair friendly toilet available also in the center. When you visit us again, please ask for one of the staff to guide you should you require assistance. Thank you once again for your support and for giving us feedback. Kind regards. CJC Team
reviews.author: Annemae Von Schlichting

reviews.text: Love everything about this place.  Will visit again for sure.

reviews.owner_answer: Hi Hannes, I am indeed sorry we have not heard back from you regarding your visit to Coffee Junction Café. If you prefer to give us further feedback via email, our email address is coffeejunctioncafe@telkomsa.net. I do hope you will send us a "one liner" with where you feel we can improve. Thank you. Duncan --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Hi Hannes, I am disappointed to see that we only scored a three star rating! Please would you kindly give me a call when suitable and provide me with more detail into your experience. I will most grateful as it will allow me to implement corrective action. 082 456 3921. Kind regards. Duncan
reviews.author: Hannes van der Westhuizen

reviews.text: Great place to sit down and relax. This place had an upgrade, and thus makes this restaurant more comfortable and enjoyable. We'll come again!
reviews.owner_answer: Thank you Martha for the great feedback and the 5 star review. We thrilled you like the new look. See you soon.
reviews.author: Martha Jansen van Rensburg

reviews.text: We had an awesome amazingly breakfast here. Service is great and very hands-on. Coffee is lekker! We had their out-of-this world eggsbenedict (R89.50). You have a choice to swop the boring english muffin for a scrumptious hashbrown that is worth the try. Be bold and try it! Also had the Greek easy scramble (R68.50) if you wanna try something different. Food are well priced and well portioned. Nice vibe with ample free parking. Shop is well situated so you can do your shopping before or after filling your tummy. They do great lunches and have a superb Sunday lunch on offer. You have to book in advance for this lunch offer. I can recommend this little gem and will be back!

sub_ratings.null: Vegetarian options, Dietary restrictions, Parking, Kid-friendliness, Wheelchair accessibility

reviews.owner_answer: Wow Rinata, this is certainly one of the nicest and most informative reviews that we have received in a long time. Thank you, thank you, thank you for going out of your way to let us and our other customers know. Please do visit us again and let us know that you are in store so we can spoil you! Duncan, Rosanne, Ronny and The Team
reviews.author: Rinata Olivier

reviews.text: As always, an excellent experience.  But. I want  to add ... this is the 2nd time I forgot parcels and the honest staff kept it for me until I realized that I left it there.  Well done Duncan and your team!!!
reviews.owner_answer: Christa we are so happy that you recovered your parcels and we are so grateful for your positive review and encouraging comments. Thank you also for your loyal support over the years!
